5449201534.response: There are a few different options you could try for pain relief. You could try over-the-counter pain medication, or you could try using a heating pad or ice pack to help reduce swelling. 5449201534.text: can you tell me difference between hot water and ice cold how both help in reducing pain
5449201534.response: There are a few different ways that hot and cold water can help with pain relief. Hot water can help to relax muscles and reduce inflammation, while cold water can help to numb the area and reduce swelling.
